OOC: I'm just assuming the defenses are on...

::Hevn::
       He shakes his head as Blackstorm leaves him alone in the mess hall.  
"Aye, does no one understand the concept of bodyguard anymore."  He waves 
goodbye and waits a few minutes before heading outside.  He has almost enough 
time to realize that no one ever changed the program to recognize him as an 
ally before the base begins firing it's autocannons at him.  He quickly 
scurries behind cover and out of range taking a mental note to get that 
fixed.  He then transforms into his large black bird form and circles high 
into the sky until he can get a fix on the location of Blackstorm.  He 
follows her from a safe distance, not wishing to alarm or even be noticed.

--part1_1d7.8b5f92a.2be877e7_boundary
